title: I_Anime
author: I_Anime
content: Bitcointalk Forum has been active for over a decade and so many historical events but only a few members know about the history of this forum I was lucky to have stumbled  on a Thread The most iconic bitcointalk threads. History on Bitcointalk.. Bitcointalk Forum has been active since the Invention of Bitcoin. I know there are alot of others who would also love to see history of Bitcointalk  has a  board or child board under bitcoin.Quote from: xtraelv We are surrounded by legends on this forum. Phenomenal successes and catastrophic failures. Then there are the scams. This forum is a digital museum.  There are other Threads of the historical events of Bitcointalk but this is the best

comments.author: bullrun2024bro
comments.body: Quote from: I_Anime on February 20, 2023, 05:56:35 AM~You're right there are many iconic threads and posts, but I doubt it's necessary to create a new board tbh. The threads will do, I guess.However, if you're interesting in the history of Bitcoin and the forum, why don't you create detailed and comprehensive thread/linklist which features the most important milestones/threads/posts of the forum. Other users would surely help you with that. While there are various threads that already link other historic posts and threads, to my knowledge, however, they are not comprehensive and/or are not regularly updated.A good start would be xtraelv's historic and educational topics, which @GazetaBitcoin linked already.
